# mbuf_setnextpkt

**Function**

## Declaration

```swift
void mbuf_setnextpkt(mbuf_t mbuf, mbuf_t nextpkt);
```

## Parameters

- **mbuf**: The mbuf.
- **nextpkt**: The new next packet.

## Discussion

Sets the next packet attached to this mbuf.
title: mbuf_setnextpkt
